title: Sumo Squat
instructions: Find an open area in the room without any items on the floor around you
Take a very wide stance and cross your arms in front of you
Begin the squat by sitting back, and focusing on keeping your chest up and knees pushed out
Repeat

title: Side Plank
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to lay down
Roll to one side
Keeping your core tight, by pulling your belly button to your spine
Raise your hips off of the ground so you are balancing on 1 foot and 1 hand
Hold for half time
Switch side and hold for the last half

title: Basic Plank
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to lay down
Starting on your hands and knees, stretch your feet back behind you and lower to your elbows
Keeping your core tight, by pulling your belly button to your spine
Hold

title: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to do a pushup
Starting in a pushup/plank position
Keeping your core tight, bring the left knee forward directly under the chest
Jump and switch legs, the opposite leg should now be tucked under your chest
Repeat

title: Jump Squat
instructions: Find an open area in the room without any items on the floor around you
Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your feet facing forward
Slowly sit back by bending the hips and knees until the thighs are parallel to the floor
Keep your weight on your heels throughout the movement and press through them
From the squat position, jump up as high as you can
Repeat

title: Air Squat
instructions: Find an open area in the room without any items on the floor around you
Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your feet facing forward
Slowly sit back by bending the hips and knees until the thighs are parallel to the floor
Keep your weight on your heels throughout the movement and press through them to return to a standing position
Repeat

title: Burpee
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to do a pushup
From a standing position, squat down and place your hands in front of you
Kick back your feet into a push-up position
quickly tuck your feet back under you to land in a squat position
Jump up so your feet leave the ground
Repeat

title: Simple Wall Sit
instructions: Find an open wall area, large enough for your body to lean against
Place your back against the wall
Walk you feet away from the wall, keeping your back against the wall
Continue lowering until your legs are at a 10 degree angle
Hold

title: Knee Highs
instructions: Find an open area in the room without any items on the floor around you
Make sure the ceiling is high enough to jump without hitting
Jump, tucking each knee, alternating, to your chest
Repeat

title: Bicycle Crunches
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to laydown
Lay on your back and lift your legs to 90 degrees
Place hands lightly behind your head
Contracting your abs, lift your shoulder blades off the floor
Twist pull your opposite knee to opposit elbow
Repeat

title: Swimmer
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to laydown
Lay on your stomach, arms stretched out in front of you
Contracting your stomach and glutes, lift everything off the floor except from your rib cage to hip bones
In a fluttering action, pump opposite arm and opposite leg
Hold and Repeat

title: Tuck Jumps
instructions: Find an open area in the room without any items on the floor around you
Make sure the ceiling is high enough to jump without hitting
Jump, tucking both knees to your chest
Repeat

title: Shoulder Bridge
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to laydown
Lay on your back and place feet flat on the floor
Contracting with your abs and pressing down with your feet lift your hips into the air
Control lowering of hips back the the ground
Repeat

title: Back Extension
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to laydown
Lay on your stomach, by your side, forehead on the floor
Contracting your stomach and glutes, lift everything off the floor except from your rib cage to hip bones
Lift as high as you can
Keeping control, lower back to starting position
Hold and Repeat

title: Star Plank
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to lay down
Starting on your hands and knees, stretch your feet back behind you
Keeping your core tight, by pulling your belly button to your spine
Walk your hands and feet away from your body and apart
Hold

title: Pushup
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to lay down
Squat down and place your hands in front of you, and walk your feet back
Keeping your core tight & shoulders away from your ears
Lower your chest as close to the floor as you can
Repeat

title: Clap Pushup
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to lay down
Squat down and place your hands in front of you, and walk your feet back
Keeping your core tight & shoulders away from your ears
Lower your chest as close to the floor as you can
From the lowest point, push up quickly launching your upper body into the air and clapping your hands
Land in the starting position
Repeat

title: Pike Pushup
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to lay down
Squat down and place your hands in front of you, and walk your feet back till you create a V shape with your body
Keeping your core tight & shoulders away from your ears
Lower the top of your head, at an angle, almost to the floor
Push back up to starting position
Repeat

title: Basic Forward Lunge
instructions: Find an open area in the room without any items on the floor around you
Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your feet facing forward
Take one average step forward
Lower your back knee directly towards the floor, creating a 90 degree angle
Keep your weight balanced between both feet
Return to starting position
Repeat

title: Jump Lunge
instructions: Find an open area in the room without any items on the floor around you
Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your feet facing forward
Take one average step forward
Lower your back knee directly towards the floor, creating a 90 degree angle
From the lowest point, jump from both feet into the air switching which foot is in front
Repeat

title: Pistol Squat
instructions: Find an open area in the room without any items on the floor around you
Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your feet facing forward
Lift one leg off the ground, keep it suspended
Slowly sit back by bending the hips and knees until the one thigh is parallel to the floor
Keep your weight on your heel throughout the movement and press through to return to a standing position
Repeat
At 45 seconds, switch sides

title: Single Leg Shoulder Bridge
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to laydown
Lay on your back and place feet flat on the floor
Lift one leg off the ground
Contracting with your abs and pressing down with your foot lift your hips into the air
Control lowering of hips back the the ground
Repeat
At 45 seconds, switch sides

title: Russian Twist
instructions: Find an open area in the room with enough room to laydown
Sit on the ground with your knees bent, and feet flat on the floor
Contract your core and tip back, lifting your feet into the air
Keeping your knees still, and core tight, twist your torso
Repeat
